attributes.action: Create a new Agency to provide Special Schools for specific conditions
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Many parents who have  children with Special Educational Needs are dissatisfied with Local Education Authorities who seem to be more concerned with the cost  of proper and effective provision for children with a wide variety of medical or learning difficulties,   and LESS concerned about the child getting an EXCELLENT and appropriate education.
Can the Government please consider setting  up a new SEN Agency  and take  provision of Special Schools away from Local Authorities.
